story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0200_10: I’m impressed you made it this far, Paulo.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0300_10:
You’ve shown me you’ve more than enough skill to
lead an organization.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0500_10: As I expected, you have the eyes of an adult.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0600_10: When I battled you before, I certainly noticed...
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0700_10:
that although you’d accepted things hadn’t gone
your way, you’re still fixed on your goals.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0800_10:
I knew you wouldn’t hesitate to use any means
necessary to gain power...
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_0900_10:
and that you’d become an adult fit to lead an
organization.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_1000_10: I believe talking to you now might be worthwhile.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_1200_10: Would you like to join forces with Team Rocket?
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_1400_10:
It’s fruitless to keep fighting each other, draining
our resources more than we already have.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_1500_10:
But if we joined forces, we could take complete
control of the world.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_1700_10:
You’d be able to create a world without evil...
That’s what you want, right?
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_1800_10: Doesn’t sound like such a bad deal.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_2100_10:
You prioritize yourself over everyone else. That’s
the sort of thinking I despise most.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_2200_10:
I can’t let you and the organization you’ve built
run around unchecked.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_2300_10:
That’s why I threw everything away—bonds,
connections, being soft... I did it to get stronger!
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_2400_10: Is that so. What a shame.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_3400_10: I see you’re not all just talk.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_3700_10:
Wouldn’t you like to work for me—and use that
power of yours as much as you like?
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_3900_10: I’m afraid you haven’t studied enough, Paulo.
story_final_01_09000/2401_1201_4000_10:
Taming a Pokémon that’s rampaging around on
pure instinct after its power’s unleashed...
